alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Clay; Clinton; Platte (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 8:37AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Buchanan, southwestern Clinton, northwestern Clay and Platte Counties through 915 AM CDT... At 836 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dearborn, or near Weston, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kansas City, Smithville, Platte City, Weston, Trimble, Edgerton, Dearborn, Camden Point, Ferrelview, Tracy, Ridgely, Kansas City Intl Arpt and Hoover. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 9 and 33. Interstate 435 between mile markers 29 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
